name: ForeverAudioQuiz
0:
”Alexa open forever audio quiz”
”Alexa launch forever audio quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forever audio quiz
des: The ultimate challenge for audio enthusiasts and sound sleuths! In this unique and captivating game, players are taken on an auditory journey through a series of meticulously crafted questions that test their knowledge and understanding of immersive audio technologies, as well as their ability to identify various sound effects. Each question is designed to not only challenge but also educate players about the fascinating world of sound.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
